title: Amazon FBA VA
job_overview:
Description:
Looking for a reliable and experienced Amazon FBA VA to manage:

Online Arbitrage product sourcing using SellerAmp, BuyBotPro, and Tactical Arbitrage

Replenishment tracking and profitability calculations

Supplier communication (basic outreach and follow-up)

Inventory monitoring and restock alerts

Daily KPI reporting

Basic Amazon PPC (optional, bonus)

Qualifications:

Proven experience with Amazon FBA (Online Arbitrage preferred)

Familiarity with Amazon Seller Central, BuyBotPro, SellerAmp, and Google Sheets

Fluent in English, detail-oriented, proactive, and trustworthy

Perks:

Long-term role with growth opportunities

Flexible work hours (output > hours)

Weekly pay via Wise or PayPal

To Apply:

Subject line: “FBA VA – I can run this business”

1-paragraph intro

Links to any Amazon FBA experience or tools you’ve used

Favorite Amazon product to buy (just for fun)
